I hope many people will pick it up. I hope many of you will pick it up.
Beyonce and I performed at our first overseas event.
At the time of this recording, we haven't finished the event yet, but by the time you are watching it, we hope that it will have been successfully completed.
I hope you all had a great time at the concert, and I hope you enjoyed the show.
I will be performing a spin show filled with the history of Hello Project's 25th anniversary,
I hope to be able to make the Thai audience excited and excited on the stage.
Well, Tourki Factory is also scheduled to perform in Hong Kong on October 14 and in Taiwan on October 15.
This will be our first overseas performance as well as our first solo performance.
It will also be my first time in Hong Kong and Taiwan, so I'm looking forward to eating the local food there.
Tsubaki Factory will start Tsubaki Factory Concert Tour 2023 Autumn Shintani Yoga on October 7.
The final concert of the tour will be held at Nippon Budokan on November 6, and it will be the first time in a year and a half for Tsubaki Factory to perform at the Budokan.

It will be the first time for Tsubaki Factory to perform at the Budokan in a year and a half, and it will be the first time for us to perform at a standing Budokan, so we are really looking forward to it, and we will do our best for each and every performance.
And we, the Beyons, are going to play the lead role in the stage play, "Biospy, the Missing Attache Case".
The story is set in Japan, a futuristic city facing east and west from the center of Tokyo, where Beyonce is a spy and how she will complete her mission to deliver an attach√© case by 7 pm tonight,
It's going to be a thrilling story. Please look forward to it!

This is Halo! I'm going to ask you a few questions, so don't think too much and answer them quickly.
Beyonce is celebrating the 5th anniversary of her major label debut!
Looking back on this period, tell me about a petty incident that makes you laugh now.
There was a member I couldn't talk to properly for about 6 months.

That there is a member who couldn't speak for about half a year...
Yes, I was a bit shy and I wasn't really aware of it, but the three members of Seasonings joined the group and I was able to talk to them.

But then the three members of Seasonings joined us, and then there was Reina Uchioka and Shiori Nishida, who were my seniors when I was a trainee at Halo Pro, and then there were the members of Seasonings who joined us.
I don't think I was able to talk to those members properly now.
So I often laugh and talk with my sisters about how I should have talked to them earlier. It's true that I get nervous. At the beginning.
I don't know how to use honorifics well, and I think the older women thought that I was younger than them and that I came in later than them.
I think we were a little awkward with each other for a long time, but not at all.
But now we can laugh about it with a sigh.
What trends are you interested in for the fall and winter season? Yes, it's called Dark Academia.
It's kind of a new subculture that's not really popular in Japan.
It's a little bit like an old mansion or a castle, or a dark atmosphere that's perfect for fall.

I've been looking up fashion items and accessories that have a classic and cute atmosphere that is perfect for fall, and I think that Minami Kawamura would look absolutely adorable in an autumn outfit that incorporates dark academia.
I'm looking forward to seeing it too. I'm so happy.

We did it! Honoo Amamizu from Tsubaki Factory
Beyonce Okamura Minami from Amemuro Kawakami presents Halo! Sta.
As I mentioned at the beginning of this article, on September 27th, the day of this distribution, Tsubaki Factory's new single
Organic It's My Life If you're just delusional, you can be free! was released!
Congratulations!
I'd like to introduce a few of the three songs,
It's My Life" is a graduation song for Riko Yamagishi,
It's My Life is Riko Yamagishi's graduation song, and you can hear a lot of her straight and honest voice in the music video.
When all the Tsubaki Factory members watched the music video together, we realized that Riko was graduating.
I think it would be more enjoyable if you could watch it together with the music video viewing party.
I think this song really gives you the courage to take the first step forward.
And if you are just delusional, the dance of "Freedom" is very distinctive and easy to dance to,
I hope many people will dance to it,
Also, in the music video, each of us wore several different costumes.
I wore a jersey and the rest were Heisei gals.
I was given the opportunity to wear costumes in a variety of settings, and there were so many extremes that I thought the range of the costumes was very interesting,
I hope people will pay attention to that.
And what's good, though, is that of the three songs, this is the one that I think shows Tsubaki Factory's character the most,
It's sad, it's a song that makes you care, it's a song that makes you a little sad to listen to,
It is a sad song that makes you feel a little sad, but I hope that you will also pay attention to the sad voices of the band members.
All three songs have different charms, so I hope you will find your favorite one.
I also had a chance to listen to all three songs,
I found Yuki Itsumai Life refreshing,
If it's just fantasy, then Freedom is,
It was so much fun and exciting to watch,
But the song "I like it" is really impressive because of the mature expressions on everyone's faces,
The song "I like it" was very impressive, with the mature expressions on everyone's faces,
Tsubaki Factory's single showed all the charm of each member,
I thought it was a lot of fun to watch.
It's a lot of fun.
Thank you very much.
Please listen to it as much as you can.
Hallo! STE!
With Mizuho Ono of Tsubaki Factory,
Beyonce, Minami Okamura of Ame no Mori Kawakami, and Mizuho Ono of Tsubaki Factory will be presenting Halo! Ste.
On September 9th and 10th, the 25th anniversary concert of Hello Low Project was held!
Once again, I think it was a gorgeous concert since it was the 25th anniversary of the project.
How was it, Minami?
Yes, I was especially impressed with the performance.
Beyonce performed a super happy song backed by Berikyu, and I never dreamed that Berryz KOBO would also perform at the ‚ÑÉ- performance.
When I was a trainee at Hello Project, I met Beyonce and some of the members of Hello Project came to Hello Project because they admired Berryz KOBO.
I was so happy that all the members of Biong's were able to perform together with Belize KOBO, and it was such a precious experience to see Belicue's cool performance up close.
It was a very precious experience for me to be able to see such a cool performance by Belizekobo up close and personal.
This time, I would like to show you the video of "Hatsukoi Sunrise" from the "all for one and one for all Act II" concert.

Risa Ogata and Nozomi Asakura, who were members of Tsubaki Factory, joined the concert for the first time in a while, and Yume Kishimoto, who was a member of Tsubaki Factory at the time of its major debut, did not join the concert.
Yume Kishimoto could not participate in the performance, but the 8 members from the time of their major label debut performed this song together.
Of course, some things have changed since the rehearsals, but we performed the first number with the members from our major label debut, and the scenery was just as it was in the old days.
I was so happy after a long time that I even cried a little.
We had not been able to sing together until now, so I am very happy that we were able to sing together at this time.
Please take a look at the video.

You are Mizuho Ono of Tsubaki Factory and Minami Okamura of Bions Ame no Morikawa Umi. It's time for the ending of Halo!
Tsubaki Factory's new single "Courage, it's my life, if you're just delusional, you can be free" has been released today.
The music video can be seen on Tsubaki Factory's official youtube channel, so please watch and listen to it!
Tsubaki Factory Concert Tour 2023 Autumn Atariyo will start on October 7th. And Tsubaki Factory will be performing overseas on October 14 and 15.
We will perform at Shiga Idol Collection on November 25th and Chikkidensai 2023 on November 26th.

It's been 4 years since we last performed at Shiga Idol Collection, and it's been a long time since we last performed at Chikkadooth Festival, so we will do our best to appeal Tsubaki Factory's charms to everyone who comes to the event. Beyons will perform at the Heian Jingu Shrine Gekiyou Kyoto Meigetsu Concert with Juice-san on September 30.
We will be performing at 2023 Heian Jingu Tsukiyo Yutaka. We are excited to hear that there are many members from Kyoto, including Shiori Nishida and Juice Juice, so it will be a fun concert.
We will also be performing at the Nagaoka Rice 100 Vote Festival Fireworks, Food, Music, and 2023 on October 8.
This will be the first time for me to go to Niigata for a Beyonce event, so I am really looking forward to this concert in Niigata Prefecture.
I am looking forward to eating a lot of rice.
On October 20, I will be performing at the halftime show for the B League game between the Kawasaki Brave Thunders and the Toyama Graugies.
This will be my first halftime show appearance in a while, and I am very much looking forward to supporting the B-League.
And we will be at Osaka Park 3K Hall Breeze from November 23 to 26.
It has been a long time since our performance, so we will do our best to show you our new charm again.
The Hello! Ste is a channel where the members of Hello! Project will appear more and more!
Please subscribe to our channel as new videos will be uploaded every Wednesday.
I'm Minami Okamura from Amemurukawa Umi. Bye bye Anne!
